name: hyperliquid-signal-system
description: A robust system to monitor on-chain perpetual trading activity on Hyperliquid and generate trading signals

scripts.install-all: cd backend/workers/ingestion && npm install && cd ../signal-processor && npm install && cd ../price-monitor && npm install && cd ../notifier && npm install && cd ../performance-tracker && npm install && cd ../../frontend/admin-panel && pnpm install
scripts.deploy-workers: cd backend/workers/ingestion && wrangler deploy && cd ../signal-processor && wrangler deploy && cd ../price-monitor && wrangler deploy && cd ../notifier && wrangler deploy && cd ../performance-tracker && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy-frontend: cd frontend/admin-panel && pnpm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name hyperliquid-admin
scripts.setup-db: wrangler d1 execute hyperliquid_signals --file=backend/db/migrations/0001_initial_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute hyperliquid_signals --file=backend/db/migrations/0002_performance_tables.sql
scripts.test-workers: echo 'Testing worker health endpoints...' && curl -f https://ingestion-worker.your-subdomain.workers.dev/health || echo 'Update worker URLs in package.json'
